title: Sibling rivalry
description: Darrien and Ramona have been at war from the moment Ramona's mother married Darrien's father. After enduring years of them fighting, their parents decide to take drastic measures. Darrien and Ramona are sent on a "getaway," so they can work out their differences. Young, extremely horny and with nothing to occupy their time, the stepsiblings soon realize there's a fine line between love and hate.
author: Terry Towers
